REGULAR.description:
Ashibe remembers how Goma-chan fell out of a truck in the beginning and puts Goma-chan in the parked truck to reminisce. But suddenly, the truck starts to move! Goma-chan is still in there! Ashibe searches for Goma-chan all over town...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 帰ってきたゴマちゃん

REGULAR.description:
Ashibe’s class shares what they did during their vacation.
Yuma went to visit a studio, Yumiko’s dad took pictures of her, and Mao drew a picture of a bottle for some reason... Ashibe tells his class about the day he went to visit Sugao-kun and his classmates are horrified.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A New School Term Begins Today!

REGULAR.description:
Akio comes to Wang Wang Ken looking depressed and Ashibe figures he’s been dumped again. When Liangliang comes to greet him, Akio falls in love. 
While Akio contemplates on how to ask Liangliang out, Goma-chan finds a frog roaming around the building.
Source: crunchyroll

Grandpa calls his employees on a Sunday to announce something important.  It’s a huge Goma-chan plane!!
They all board for the maiden flight, but there’s something odd about the plane...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 飛べ! ゴマちゃん号

REGULAR.description:
Chit finds a white fluffy ball in front of Sugao’s house and assumes it’s Yeti, but it’s a ball of little Yetis!
The little fur balls may be cute but they’re causing chaos in Sugao’s house.
Meanwhile, Goma-chan has quickly become good friends with the frog and Ashibe even names it Hirao.
But does Goma-chan have an ulterior motive to this new friendship?
Source: crunchyroll

Peppeppe receives a package from Ashibe’s mom to Ashibe’s grandpa, her boss.
She never expected to find Goma-chan in the box, though!
She uses the president’s elevator only to find out she doesn’t know how to operate it...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ペッペッペッさん危機一髪!

REGULAR.description:
Ashibe takes Goma-chan for a dental checkup, but Goma-chan keeps hearing people screaming as they enter the exam room. 
What is going on in there?
When it’s finally Goma-chan’s turn, Ashibe realizes he’s missing...
Source: crunchyroll

After sending Ashibe and Pa off, Ma starts her daily housework. 
While Ma is cleaning, Goma-chan finds her secret savings. 
Ma has completely forgot about it! She decides to do a little shopping...
Source: crunchyroll

Ashibe and Kanji rushes to Ajita’s apartment to care for a cat that’s going in labor.
After the kittens are safely delivered, Kanji tells Ajita to take care of them.
Ajita will only agree if Kanji does his work for him.
Source: crunchyroll

It’s been raining for days and while Goma-chan and Hirao are enjoying the weather, Pa is irritated he can’t go to work.
Ma tells Ashibe how to predict the weather by throwing a geta sandal, but Ashibe uses Goma-chan instead!
Will the sun ever show up again?
Source: crunchyroll

Goma-chan is stuck in the drainage and Mr. Tagawa saves him.
To repay Mr. Tagawa for his troubles, Pa visits the Tagawa’s to thank him, but for some reason, Mr. Tagawa’s son thinks he’s a seal.
Pa figures out why from the book the little boy is holding...
Source: crunchyroll

Ashibe goes camping with his friends and family.
While Goma-chan swims in the river, Ashibe catches a large tuna!?
Goma-chan finally comes back during dinner and it looks like he brought some new friends...
Source: crunchyroll

Ashibe and his family go to the summer festival and Ma remembers how different Ashibe is compared to last year.
Ashibe was reluctant to go to the festival wearing a summer kimono, but Suago’s already waiting for him.
No matter what Ma and Pa say, Ashibe does not want to see Sugao wearing a kimono...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: アシベとスガオの夏祭り

REGULAR.description:
Ashibe enters Goma-chan in a dog contest disguised as a dog. While Goma-chan can’t do common dog tricks, he can do what other dogs can’t. One of the contestant, Michiru, doesn’t like the fact Goma-chan is even with his dog, Brian, so he wants to find out Goma-chan’s weakness...
Source: crunchyroll

Ajita and Saotome has made a mistake on their order and now they must sell one billion Ramune drinks.
They see Ashibe and his friends playing in the park and find out kids love the rubber flavor of the Ramune?!
They decide to have a hero show for children in order to sell the drinks and one man shows up to give a hand...
Source: crunchyroll

Goma-chan is sick and tired of being Pa’s pillow, but today, a luxury pillow arrives in Ashibe’s house.
It’s a big hit with everyone. They like it so much, they start fighting over it.
Goma-chan isn’t sure if he likes this newcomer...
Source: crunchyroll

Sakata is bored during vacation and Big Bro tells him he has booked a stay at a hotel.
Sakata wonders where they’ll be staying at, but it turns out it’s... Ashibe’s house?!
Big Bro is so happy to be spending the night with Goma-chan, but Sakata is not having nearly as much fun...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ゴマちゃんホテルへようこそ!

REGULAR.description:
Yuma’s mother is an actress and she’s starring on a film in Nara, but Ashibe and Yuma shows up.
It turns out Ashibe’s Grandpa has brought them there.
Tamao Otama, an idol, is in the film too, but it’s her first time acting. 
Yuma’s mother gets upset at her acting skill and Tamao runs away...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 奈良名所巡りミステリー

REGULAR.description:
Yuma’s mom got a role as an patissier, but the fact is, she’s not a good baker at all.
Ashibe brings Peppeppe to help Yuma’s mom become a better baker, but Yuma and Goma-chan knows how awful Yuma’s mom’s cooking is. 
Can they keep this a secret from Ashibe and Peppeppe?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ペッペッペッさんのケーキ教室

REGULAR.description:
Chit-chan brings delicious tree fruits to Sugao and his family, but Teacher eats them all! Curly Locks is very upset and leaves. No one knows where he went! Meanwhile, Goma-chan and Hirao are having a fun conversation...
Source: crunchyroll

Ms. Minami is thinking about Sugao-kun’s teacher when Mr. Tendou bumps into her, making her lose her glasses.
Her fellow teacher gives her a makeover and Ms. Minami looks completely different!
Meanwhile, Mr. Tendou is busy checking himself out when he notices a pair of glasses on his head.
Source: crunchyroll

Hirao looks very sleepy and Ashibe and his friends find out he’s going to hibernate soon. Not wanting Hirao to hibernate, Ashibe and his friends try everything to prevent him from sleeping, but Hirao can’t keep his eyes open. What are they going to do?
Source: crunchyroll

Peppeppe is sneaking in the president’s office. Is she up to no good?
She does everything she can to keep the contract away from the president, but why?
Is she planning to take over Grandpa’s company?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ペッペッペッさんのヒ・ミ・ツ

REGULAR.description:
Riko notices Liangliang is uneasy and finds out she is in love with... Hitoshi-kun?!
She wants to introduce him to her papa, but he fell in the river and arrives soaking wet.
Riko decides to pick out a stylish outfit for him, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: リャンリャンとヒトシくん

REGULAR.description:
Sakata just can’t win against Ashibe’s Brotherly Love Hold and he’s getting frustrated!
There has to be a way to overcome Ashibe’s special move.
Just when he’s about to give up, enter Mao-chan`s uncle, Akio...
Source: crunchyroll

Ma is busy with her big year-end cleaning, so Ashibe and Goma-chan want to help.
Ma asks them to go buy a cucumber, but when Ashibe sees Kanji troubled by the lack of customers, he wants to help him too.
As Ashibe and Goma-chan help the stores, Goma-chan quickly becomes the celebrity of the entire shopping street.
Source: crunchyroll

Yuma got a telescope by wishing upon a shooting star, so he invites his friends to his place to make a wish too.
Ashibe tries to come up with a wish, but they’re all coming true before nightfall.
He decides to go ask his friends what they’re wishing for. Will he find his wish?
Source: crunchyroll

Sugao’s teacher is going back to Japan to renew his passport, so Sugao hands him a gift for Ashibe.
As soon as Teacher arrives in Japan, he is met with generous friends of Ashibe. 
But will his usual habit present itself and overstay his welcome?
Source: crunchyroll

Ashibe’s grandpa builds an ice rink for his company and all of Ashibe’s friends are there to skate.
Goma-chan is excited to skate for the first time, but gets frustrated when he can’t figure out how.
That is, until Ashibe’s ma shows up with ice pops...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ゴマちゃん オン アイス

REGULAR.description:
Goma-chan sees a news report about a zoo in Sapporo and wants to go see the full grown spotted seals.
Pa agrees to take a family trip to Hokkaido, but not just because Goma-chan wants to go.
Around the time Goma-chan came to Ashibe痴 place, there was a report on a missing baby seal at that zoo...
Source: crunchyroll

Pa tells Ashibe the truth about coming to Hokkaido, and Ashibe is so upset, he runs off with Goma-chan.
While searching for Ashibe, Pa and Ma run into Grandpa, Sugao-kun and his family.
They explain what happened and Suago-kun quickly goes looking for Ashibe...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: さよならなんて言わないよ!

REGULAR.description:
Ashibe hears Sugao-kun痴 voice, but Goma-chan is very sick and needs to be taken to the doctor immediately.
Will Ashibe make it in time to save Goma-chan?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 少年アシベ GO! GO! ゴマちゃん (2017)
